title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3139/92 of 29 October 1992 fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer price for artichokes applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3139/92  of 29 October 1992  fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer price for artichokes applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1992/93 marketing year, the Community offer price for artichokes (CN code 0709 10 00) applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all sizes, shall be as  follows:
- from 1 November to
31 December 1992: 89,75,
- from 1 January to
30 April 1993: 73,04,
- May 1993 60,96,
- June 1993 47,45.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 October 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 363, 13. 12. 1989, p. 3. (2) OJ No L 362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 16. (3) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 6. (4) OJ No L 201, 31. 7. 1990, p. 9. (5) OJ No L 366, 29. 12. 1990, p. 43. (6) OJ No L 277, 22. 9. 1992, p. 18.
